descriptionShort: A quiz game built with JavaScript featuring multiple-choice questions, real-time scoring, and a timer that deducts 10 seconds for each incorrect answer. The player's final score equals the remaining time left in seconds

Weather app built with JavaScript and Open Weather API displaying the current weather and 5-day forecast of any city searched by the user. The app features local storage functionality to save search history, providing a user-friendly experience and easy access to previously searched locations.

Collaborated with 2 other students to develop a fun Top Trumps inspired game as a group project for a Front End Development Bootcamp. The game presents players with a random character and its unique set of skills, requiring them to strategically select a power to use against the computer's randomly selected hidden character.
Our second group project for the Bootcamp. A recipe app that allows users to input ingredients they want to use and then presents recipe options using those ingredients.
